data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Pinto-Da-Rocha, Ricardo, Manzanilla, Osvaldo Villarreal (2009): Cladistic analysis of the Stygninae and description of a new species of Protimesius Roewer, 1913 (Opiliones: Stygnidae). Zootaxa 2176: 48-56, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.189348
